title: Stones River National Battlefield: Outdoor Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things to Do     Outdoor Activities               Outdoor Activities         Wild turkeys at Stones River National Battlefield   The landscapes of Stones River National Battlefield offer visitors an array of historic and natural features to experience during their stay. Some popular outdoor activities available at the park are: Interpretive Programs Walking/Hiking Jogging Bicycling Animal Watching Picnicking is only permitted in the picnic area directly across the parking lot from the visitor center. Skates, skateboards, and scooters are not permitted. Other recreational activities such as kite flying and ball games are also prohibited.  Â       Get some exercise and visit most of the park's units by walking or biking on the Murfreesboro Greenway System. Greenway System Map
